website_summaries.verdict: Despite the possibility of them riding up, these pretty briefs are worth considering for occasions when a little lace fits your mood.
pros: The lacy waist and leg band give them an ultra-feminine look
Cotton and spandex blend provides a flexible, comfortable fit
cons: The briefs may occasionally ride up, requiring awkward adjustments

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that it is ALL cotton as I am allergic to synthetic materials that some underwears are made of. The softness added with the beautiful lace makes for a very sexy underwear. ---My wife wrote this review. I do not wear sexy panties... -KB
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable panties I've found in a long time. Other reviews have said they ride up. I would say that if you have a small-ish backside this could be an issue. For curvier figures (5'4" and 154 lbs) the fit is great and I don't get any ride up at all. In fact I teach fitness classes - cardio aerobic as well as strength training and Mat Pilates and they are so comfortable under my close fitting leggings I forget I have them on. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: These ride up horribly if you have an athletic rear end!
customer_reviews.text: Vanity Fair has been my go-to panty for years, but I always buy the ones made of a higher lycra blend- more substantial. Thought I'd try these, for a more feminine, delicate style; as an alternative for dressier evenings... and am so bummed that for the price, they don't remotely hold their place. Might as well have bought a thong. May work for girls with flat butts and a very thin build. For reference, I wear a size 6 and have a gymnast/soccer player hiney; if this is remotely your shape, do NOT waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R. Luksic

customer_reviews.title: No More Granny Panties!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought a pair in a local store and they fit so well, don't fall down, don't look like Granny Panties, and don't slip under my mom-belly. So I ordered 5 pairs on Amazon. They are the best underwear and will be all I wear from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I originally purchased these in a department store but when I went to purchase some more I found that they seemed to have disappeared. Therefore I was so happy to have found them on Amazon. They are so light and airy and so feminine. I found the fit to be true to size. If you are an older woman these are still youthful looking and feeling . I am not ready for full briefs yet and find bikini bottoms to be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: interested

customer_reviews.title: Each size 6 made differently
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly nice panties, however, each size 6 the I order is made differently and I just don't understand this lack of quality. The most recent pair I ordered the lace around the waist has no give whatsoever, and overall the panty is smaller then the first size 6 I ordered. Just so dissatisfied with the lack of quality and craftsmanship in products today.
customer_reviews.author: Lola 48

customer_reviews.title: Almost what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These panties almost fit as I expected. I would have prefered that the leg opening by slightly cut higher (not high cut) and the back leg opening be full coverage. I tried them in a store and they appeared fine. As I wore them the back rode up enough that I wanted to pull them down. I can probably get used to it. I hoped they would be similar to discontinued panties that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy F

customer_reviews.title: perfect panty
customer_reviews.text: These panties fit perfectly (I am size 14 and ordered XL/8). They truly do not roll down and are no-show through clothing. I highly recommend these! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: QuinnLittle

customer_reviews.title: Bikinis not briefs
customer_reviews.text: To me, a brief should come up to your waist. These do not. They fit more like bikini underwear. And, the bottom part on the crotch is so small, maybe one inch in diameter, not enough to cover the private part in my opinion. I will not be purchasing these again. Bali has a much better brief, style 2324 if you are interested.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonContributor

customer_reviews.title: Hey Vanity Fair get with it. Make her “a waist high panty!”
customer_reviews.text: I wish they went up to the waist. I am not used to wearing underwear this low on my hips. I think a lot of women in their 60s and 70s and 80s feel the same way. We buy a lot of underwear so somebody ought to make what we want!
customer_reviews.author: Angelworld

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these before and have worn them for years and was elated to see them again and with such great reviews but was extremely disappointed in everything about this garment. The material is soft but not the same quality as my previous briefs, the fit is horrible in that it rides up at your rear and doesn't cover you. It is skimped on material in the front so much I thought they had sent me a hi-cut by mistake. If it didn't have Vanity Fair stamped on it, I would say it was a cheap knockoff and probably is. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Fits up to the natural waist, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These panties pretty much met my expectations of being a high enough cut and comfortable. I still wish I could find some that were a bit more "French Cut" with narrower sides and a slightly higher waist (this one stayed up pretty well - but I did tug them once or twice during the day). I have been searching for a high cut style that Hanes used to make in nylon that I still have a few of # 15763 - but alas, even the Hanes site no longer lists it.
customer_reviews.author: Boutique Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but these are creepers
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to say this gracefully but .... this panty is a creeper! Very pretty to look at and looks good on but if you have to sit, stand or move often the sides eventually creep up slowly past the buttocks and into an unattractive and uncomfortable bunch that has to be manually pulled down and out. Whew!! Wish it were possible to return these. At the price I paid that hurts twice...
customer_reviews.author: Beast fan

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite panty!
customer_reviews.text: I think I've found my new favorite panties!! I no longer can find the Vanity Fair style I have worn for years so I shopped and researched and decided to give these a try. I actually like them better than my old style. These are made of a thin stretchy material that is light weight and so comfortable. They do not show any panty line or give you "muffin top". The lace at the top and the leg make them more feminine, too!
customer_reviews.author: gsugar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one pair to see how they fit. Overall, they are nice. I like that they are thin at the leg bands. I ordered a 6 and compared to other brands, they fit a little snug. Also, the waist band does roll down. I would probably buy more of these, except for the price. $11.50 is very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Metermaid

customer_reviews.title: There is full coverage but think of back of leg more like a triangle cut out then a high arch
customer_reviews.text: The fit was not the issue. Pants size is 16 so ordered the 9 which was fin but high cut is so high that creates wedgie issues in back. There is full coverage but think of back of leg more like a triangle cut out then a high arch. It will cover when you put them on and then you take one step more than 6" and you've lost 'em ladies. Think again on other options.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few pairs of the nylon ones from a brick and mortar store a month or so ago. They're the best. I got a pair of cotton on here that were waaaaay cheaper. They're not the best. The cut is a little different and they're not nearly as soft as you'd expect. I'm keeping them though because they're cheap and black and I needed them. Future purchases will be made at the same brick and mortar for a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: lane

customer_reviews.title: My favorite panties
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite underwear. I’m tall (5’10”) so many bikini undies are really too tiny to offer any coverage. These do, plus they stay in place without digging in. The cotton fabric is a nice weight, the leg holes are wide enough to give you a long line & not look like granny panties, and the lace trim offers a feminine detail.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sete Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Oddly made for VANITY FAIR
customer_reviews.text: These panties are a very nice cotton blend and they look nice but as soon as I put them on the crawled right up my bum :(( the elastic around thighs is barely there and they were so loose that there was no way I could wear- straight into the trash cuz who returns used undies?! A good alternative and costs less is Warner’s high-cut cotton blend briefs. Much more quality and cost less BONUS: they look the same
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Second order
customer_reviews.text: Vanity Fair Women's Flattering Lace Cotton Stretch Brief Panty 13396 Well constructed. Not high-cut! The waistband is a bit below the waist, but significantly higher than a hipster cut. The lace band lies flat, the elasticized leg openings have generous give, and the panty has the comfortable 4-way stretch one expects from cotton jersey. A bit pricey, but worth trying. Excellent for people who want cotton and would like a touch of lace.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Piffle

customer_reviews.title: I like the other three very much
customer_reviews.text: One of the four that I bought is made of a far thinner material. I like the other three very much.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pair of briefs
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair of briefs I love the lace on the top band, very feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Duffy

customer_reviews.title: The panty I’ve been searching for!
customer_reviews.text: These are the undies I’ve been looking for. Cotton with a nice lace waistband. Comfy, stays put. Nice leg opening & not granny-panty looking. Perfect for a y’all chick like myself for whom bikinis often don’t cover enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sete Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: What a letdown
customer_reviews.text: Ordered expensive lace mid-rise panty. Received plain giant cotton granny panties. Not worth the effort to return. DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Boroughs

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The material feels bad against the skin and the fit is wierd and not comfortable. I had much better luck with the "Warner's No Pinching No Problems Cotton Lace Hi Cut Panty" and have since ordered more. This one I threw out and I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JSMNT

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel for men
customer_reviews.text: I bought the style that is solid fabric, not the all-over lace. These panties are lightweight and comfortable, and feel barely there. Sufficient fabric, support, and stretch in the front for men. Breathable and cool for warm days or workouts. They stay put on me and don't ride up. The lace waistband doesn't roll, but with its high-cut style the waistband will peek out above low-cut pants. (Is that a pro or a con?) Love these and will be buying more and a wider range of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: The best panties!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable panties I've ever worn. They are high cut exactly as pictured and described. I got size 6 which is my normal size (5'4", 130 lbs). No panty lines, no rolling of the waistband. I got several pairs in black but I plan on ordering more in the lighter shades to wear under white. I highly recommend them. And they are pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this brand and style for long time. I hate you can’t find them anywhere anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflygirl1121

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: I keep re-ordering this style when I find it on sale. Not bulky at the top, fits sleekly, and the lace top stays flat and in place. I am stocking up on these.
customer_reviews.author: YellowRoseTXTop Contributor: Fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Material is so soft and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that it is ALL cotton as I am allergic to synthetic materials that some underwears are made of. The softness added with the beautiful lace makes for a very sexy underwear. ---This is another review written by my wife... I do not wear sexy panties. -KB
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Crawls up, and creeps down!
customer_reviews.text: These are not comfortable! The crawl up in the back, and creep down in the front. I should have just ordered one pair till I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Y.

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and were nice soft undies. I washed them before use and they shrunk three sizes. I could not even get them on. I gave them to a friend who usually wears a 4. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Seasalt

customer_reviews.title: hard to find
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find lace topped cotton underwear. I saw these and I love them. They have a wide strip of lace at the top and I'm hopeful they will last. So far, when washed they look like new
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Lower than the photo
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5 124 lbs, these panties came up lower on me than the photo. Enough coverage for the butt, just lower than I thought in the front. I was hoping it would cover a scar and it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Nurseperson

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, cute. Ordered my true size and it fit as expected, was worried about it running small but it did not. Did not give it 5 starts b/c I thinks it is a little pricey. Other than that the undie is good.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for wedgies!
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I thought these panties were soft and comfortable, and looked quite flattering. However, within two hours of putting them on, I became increasingly frustrated with the fact that I kept getting wedgies and was constantly having to "readjust" my panties every time I changed positions. I would not recommend these panties for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Love the feminine lace
customer_reviews.text: I love these panties! The lace gives it a nice girly touch. They fit a feel great. Any guy who loves wearing panties should get some of these. You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Yukon Dan

customer_reviews.title: Both Flattering and a Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because there are no tags to irritate the skin. I think they fit just right even after washing and I like the lace and higher cut leg. I got these to replace a style that is no longer made by another competitor and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Pantie
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very lightweight, but the fit is as expected from Vanity Fair and the color is neutral. Good for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: GHB

customer_reviews.title: Allow for shrinking
customer_reviews.text: Nice underwear, but they shrink and now they are too small.
customer_reviews.author: TRBenton

customer_reviews.title: These panties are thin enough to be invisible under clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: These panties are thin enough to be invisible under clothing. The lace is delicate though,so I launder them in a mesh bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item. They were way too big and I just didn't like the look of the panty.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Dube

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Super super thin material, no hold whatsoever and lace rolls down. Nice color options but fit was not good, Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: high waist panties simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I like these pant because they come all the way to my waist and fit nicely with pants or skirts. Cotton feels nice next to skin. Highly recommend if you like hi cut high waist
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Fit, material, look- perfect
customer_reviews.text: Breathable, pretty sleek material, lace makes them sexy. They are soft, fit very well, no panty line. I'm replacing old w/ these. No binding , rolling, or cutting. Wash / dry like new. Slims my line when I wear dresses. Can't feel I'm wearing them. Good for hot climate. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jg

customer_reviews.title: I'm doing trial n error to try to find underwear that I like.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a style that is no longer in production from Vanity Fair and I thought these might be the same...closer than most.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit like expected
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand before and they are my favorite. These felt a little small.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: I would have preferred French cut panties
customer_reviews.text: These would be French cut if they had extended to the natural waist. Sure wish they did!
customer_reviews.author: Lacemaker427

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed new undies after losing 50# n having worn out granny panties. These are very comfortable n wash well. Have ordered more in same n other colors after trying first pair. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YaYa

customer_reviews.title: Feminine briefs
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find cotton briefs with lace trim these days, and these are perfect. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood Ranger

customer_reviews.title: these are great!
customer_reviews.text: these are so comfy and they fit perfectly! the waistband is not too tight, not too loose, the material isn't itchy, they are some of my favorite pairs! A+++
customer_reviews.author: The Ormons

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these underwear. No fat bulges. Nice soft lace elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cotton!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is good and I love that they are cotton. My only wish is that they had a little more stretch to them - then they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: V. Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Good product; may run a little big.
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit larger than expected, I think. Quality just fine. If the price were a bit lower I would re-order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Colorist

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Wish the fabric was silky. It’s a cotton knit, so the fabric of my garments cling to the panties.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudyLA

customer_reviews.title: way too thin.
customer_reviews.text: fine other than they are super thin. Do not expect them to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L

customer_reviews.title: HIghly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great and wish I had ordered more! The product is comfortable and lasts wash after wash
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and very comfortable panties
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, and look pretty good, even on us larger women. I plan to order more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pretty panties I own.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted lightweight, no lines to show when wearing slacks, & durable. Got all 3. & pretty & delicate looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, but run small in my opinion. I am 170lb with an apple shape
customer_reviews.author: R Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great, comfortable and sexy panties. I am an hourglass figure and 8/10 in clothes and I ordered a size seven, which is my normal size in vanity fair panties.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ride up
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable. Ride up constantly. Will not buy again and won't be wearing the pair I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Milon Babu

customer_reviews.title: No the Olga panties I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for the Olga panties. The ones that don’t climb up or down. They are not those!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: When I took one out of the bag, I understood why these are priced so low. Doubtful they'd stand up to more than a few washings.
customer_reviews.author: sometomato

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This do not fit at all to high on the waist and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kylenchell

customer_reviews.title: vanity fair does it again
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these for when i want to feel pretty and sexy , they look and feel so good i just love them. thanks vanity fair
customer_reviews.author: cristine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far, the most comfortable underwear I have ever had. I will never buy any other brand or type of underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Raberdash

customer_reviews.title: POOR SIZING/ OUTRAGEOUSLY PRICED
customer_reviews.text: POOR SIZING. I KNOW MY PANTY SIZE AND NEVER HAS CHANGED. I TRIED THESE ON AND OF COURSE IT IS AN UNDERGARMENT SO I AM SURE THERE IS NO RETURN. FOR THIS HIGH OF A PRICE PANTY THEY SHOULD HAVE FIT. 10$ FOR ONE PAIR OF UNFITTING UNDERWEAR IS OUTRAGEOUSLY PRICED
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Misikin-Swatek

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: This panty is very comfortable, virtually no panty line, and does not ride up. I love these! I recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: all I could ask for
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, are comfortable and very pretty. What more could I ask?
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brown

customer_reviews.title: So soft! Great fit -
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable and fits true to size - doesn't show panty lines - I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and launders and dries in dryer beautifully. Will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love these panties...so comfortable and they stay in place. Also, the quality is great..
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: ... same item so I would say I am a satisfied customer. Great product and great seller
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of the same item so I would say I am a satisfied customer. Great product and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHeart

customer_reviews.title: Best under pants ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love this panties. They fit perfectly, and the quality is great, and I just ordered 3 more pairs. I highly recommend them. I weigh 114, and the size 6 was perfect. Georgie
customer_reviews.author: Georgeann Haubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable panty. I am middle age and these fit modestly and are very comfortable. They are also attractive. Wash great.
customer_reviews.author: CL54

customer_reviews.title: I really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I really like this one. There is no riding up, nice and pretty. Only wish they came in size 7 rather than 6/7. Still searching for the perfect pair that can get the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian V.

customer_reviews.title: Fits very large. Buy a size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: It fits very large. It also is very much a high-rise which I was not expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Deal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received and as ordered size fit good over clothes -will give 1st wash shortly
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty panty but I found myself pulling. So doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this brand and style for long time. I hate you can’t find them anywhere anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflygirl1121

customer_reviews.title: Not to great
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but after warring them twice the lace is already ripping!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Just a bit small but not so much that I can't wear them. I will keep these but next time I order I will go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect... everything I love... comfy & pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect...just love them... so hard to find hi cut legs that fit at the waist with lace edges... sooooo comfy.... & I like dark colors...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: vanity fair is great
customer_reviews.text: vanity fair did again with these lovely panties not only do they look super sexy. they feel like not wearing anything at all will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: cristine

customer_reviews.title: Lace Hi Cut Panties
customer_reviews.text: These panties fit like a dream and they're so soft you hardly feel like you're wearing anything. The trim at the waist and leg openings is pretty but doesn't bind or feel tight. I'm extremely pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: MC Pfister

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice panty. Lace doesn’t rip when you grip. (Kathy Ireland label DID)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Panty
customer_reviews.text: Nice panty, no lines. Soft and feels good against skin. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Soft cotton with a little stretch
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I bought these because I like the lace trim and can’t find them anywhere anymore. They can be a little pricey depending on the color you choose. They are also briefs, as the photo displays, but I don’t think it’s mentioned in the description. I will be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: JT60

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that this was only ONE pair of panties!!. I thought it was a pack of three!!. Very overpriced for one pair. The material is thin and flimsy, definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Suly

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: country spearmint is turquoise ... to me they run large. You have to be large to wear a large :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: No Consistent Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but sizing was too small. Weird since i own the same size,brand & style in french cut & they r too big! Had to return these and change brands.
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: same style I already had. love the fit. used the RN # to match them up.
customer_reviews.author: LILLIE

customer_reviews.title: They ride up and are very uncomfortable because of this.
customer_reviews.text: The Black fit but they ride up so much so that after wearing them just about one hour I took them off and threw them away. Am hoping the beige and the white pair don’t ride up like that, it’s so uncomfortable and I refuse to endure it.
customer_reviews.author: Econorail

customer_reviews.title: and they are very comfortable and very flattering
customer_reviews.text: I have worn OLGA panties for years, but tried these, and they are very comfortable and very flattering. I just ordered 10 more pair!
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Panties are a bit loose, based on regular size. I would have ordered at least a size smaller. Nice panties though, very comfortable. No tummy control if that is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Claws

customer_reviews.title: bad quality- not the same quality as if purchased from a regular retailer
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I've bought these in a dept store and they were fine. THIS pair is unravelling all over. Crappy quality. I'll pay the extra $1.50 in a store for panties that won't start falling apart after 1 wash.
customer_reviews.author: big feet

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable. No panty lines
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable. No panty lines. Fabric is a bit on the lightweight side, so not sure how well they will hold up on repeated wash.
customer_reviews.author: KayC

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: When new, panties fit as expected. However after first wash in cold water and dried on low the hi-cut brief became almost as short as a bikini. Disappointed as I had hoped to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit-perfect fabric!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is exactly what I wanted and the fabric is lightweight and stretchable - offering great comfort for wearing under any item of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ford

product_meta.title: Vanity Fair Women's Flattering Lace Panties with Stretch
product_meta.description: Flattering lace brief is made with ultra soft fabric that has an amazing stretch to adjust perfectly to your body. Lace waist and leg elastic offer a stylish look while staying in place.
feature_bullets: Beautiful lace waist and leg elastic for a stylish look and guaranteed hold
Flat seams will give a flattering look and no panty lines
Ultra soft fabrications will perfectly adjust to the body
